class.name: de.amberhome.materialdialogs.MaterialDialogWrapper
class.event: ButtonPressed (Dialog As MaterialDialog, Action As String)
InputChanged (Dialog As MaterialDialog, Input As String)
ItemSelected (Dialog As MaterialDialog, Position As Int, Text As String)
ItemLongSelected (Dialog As MaterialDialog, Position as Int, Text As String)
SingleChoiceItemSelected (Dialog As MaterialDialog, Position As Int, Text As String)
MultiChoiceItemSelected (Dialog As MaterialDialog, SelectedIndexes As List, SelectedText As List) As Boolean
SimpleItemSelected (Dialog As MaterialDialog, Position As Int, Item As MaterialSimpleListItem)
CustomViewReady (Dialog As MaterialDialog, CustomView As Panel)

class.name: de.amberhome.materialdialogs.MaterialDialogsActivity.MDManager
class.comment: The MaterialDialogsManager raises the FileChooser, FolderChooser and ColorChooser events.
class.event: FolderSelected (Dialog As FolderChooserDialog, Path As String, Name As String)
FileSelected (Dialog As FileChooserDialog, Path As String, Name As String)
ColorSelected (Dialog As ColorChooserDialog, Color As Int)

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Check if the manager is initialized

method.name: Initialize
method.comment:
Initialize the MaterialDialogsManager object.
EventName: The name prefix for the events IntervalMs: Timer interval in milliseconds. This will setup a timer which will call the Draw event so the WatchFace gets updated. This timer will fire only in interactive mode and when the WatchFace is visible.

method.name: ProgressNumberFormat
method.comment: Change the format of the small text showing current and maximum units of progress. The default is "%1d/%2d".
